BRAZIL-SOUTHEAST COAST.
1. SEISMIC SURVEY IN PROGRESS UNTIL 100259Z MAR BY
   M/V NPS VERITAS VIKING TOWING EIGHT 3.5 MILE
   LONG CABLES IN AREA BOUND BY
   24-36.51S 041-21.14W, 24-33.17S 041-24.03W,
   24-29.39S 041-26.42W.
   SIX MILE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL THIS MSG 100359Z MAR.
